document.full_text: renewed fighting in yemen's capital between a powerful tribal group and president ali abdullah saleh's forces has killed at least 19 people this week and rocked sanaa with explosions, officials said on wednesday.
document.title: explosions and street fighting grip yemen capital
lines_and_colors: renewed fighting in yemen's capital between a powerful tribal group and president ali abdullah saleh's forces has killed at least 19 people this week and rocked sanaa with explosions, officials said on wednesday.
